verb.comment: EGYPTIAN ARABIC Framefile based on saraq-v

example.parse: (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS قال) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PUNC :) (S (PUNC ") (S (ADVP-PRD (ADV هناك)) (SBAR-NOM-SBJ (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON من)) (S (VP (IV3MP+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:MP_MOOD:I يسرقون) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC اموال) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN البلاد)))))))
